item.title: Favorite Johor Food Places
item.author: Hong
item.description: This is a listing of my favorite food places in Klang Valley. China Cuisine Restoran Fu Cheng 福成 Address: 6, Jalan 1/77b, Jalan Changkat Thambi Dollah, 55100 Kuala Lumpur Japanese Ramen Bari-Uma Ramen Address: Lot L3-11, Level 3, Jaya Shopping Centre, Jalan Professor Khoo Kay Kim, Seksyen 14, 46100 Petaling Jaya, Selangor Pork Noodle Omega Pork Noodle @ Sri Petaling Address: No 74, Ground Floor, Jalan Radin Tengah, Bandar Baru Sri Petaling, 57000 Kuala Lumpur
